meanings.definition: The state or quality of being excessively diverse.
meanings.sent1: The overdiversities in the classroom made it hard to choose a group project topic.
meanings.sent2: The overdiversities of opinions in the meeting led to a lengthy discussion.
meanings.sent3: The overdiversities of ice cream flavors at the party caused a delightful dilemma.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe displayed an overdiversities of colors, like a rainbow in motion.
meanings.sent5: The overdiversities of wildlife in the forest painted a vibrant picture of nature.

meanings.definition: A wide variety or range of differences.
meanings.sent1: The overdiversities of plants in the garden created a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: The overdiversities of cultures in the city made it a melting pot of traditions.
meanings.sent3: The overdiversities of books on the shelf offered endless choices for reading.
meanings.sent4: His collection of stamps showcased an overdiversities of countries and themes.
meanings.sent5: The overdiversities of skills among the team members complemented each other perfectly.
